titles.title: A resolution recognizing the life and accomplishments of Wellington Mara of New York.

vote.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment and with a preamble by Unanimous Consent.

bill.summary: 10/26/2005--Passed Senate without amendment. Expresses the Senate's condolences to the family of Wellington Mara. Recognizes Mara's life, accomplishments, and dedication to the New York Giants and their fans.
